p: The ω3LC0 diet also resulted in the lowest HSI which is contrary to the results of other studies on salmonids (e.g. [ 28], [ 29]), in which HSI was statistically unaffected by the increase of vegetable oil content in the diet. However, in those studies the maximum vegetable oil content was 20%, whereas here the ω3LC0 diet had the highest inclusion of vegetable oil at 27%.
